text: The Alid Volcano is a stratovolcano located in the Northern Red Sea region of Eritrea in the Danakil Depression. The peak elevation from its base is . The volcano's most recent activity was identified in 1928, when it emitted smoke. It is a large volcano located in the northern east coast. ==See also== *List of volcanoes in Eritrea *List of stratovolcanoes == References == * Category:Mountains of Eritrea Category:Stratovolcanoes of Eritrea Category:Active volcanoes Category:Rift volcanoes
title: Alid Volcano
